directions: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat; cook apples and parsnip in the melted butter until slightly softened, about 5 minutes. Stir water, brown sugar, and cinnamon into apple-parsnip mixture; cook until sugar dissolves and apple-parsnip mixture has softened, about 5 minutes. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: 2 Granny Smith apples, peeled and diced
1 large parsnip, peeled and cut into long thin pieces
title: Parsnip and Apple Dessert
